channel.title: Runescape Remake?
channel.description:
I've googled and searched mopar all over but i cant seem to find a good runescape remake. A F2P Remake would be really nice, i found one here:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=438392.0 but i cant download it because it has been deleted by mediafire. does anyone have that source and is willing to share it with me?? Do you know any other sources that are good rs remakes? [size=3pt]I dont wanna play vaults remake when it comes out because rs2007 was[/size][size=10pt]shit[/size][size=3pt] and he is just an irresponsible little 14 year old.[/size]
well thanks for helping anyways :P:P:P:P

item.title: Runescape Remake?
item.dc:creator: @nickog15 nickog15
item.description:
@nickog15 wrote:

Building Runescape Private Servers are not for remaking runescape, they are to learn the code that runescape uses and learn how to make it like runescape knowing how to do every little damn detail. By the end of it you should know how to code a whole runescape server with a computer, a folder, and notepad. No-Internet. No-Turts. No-Friends. Nothing.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Remake?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“morot4, post:6, topic:419477”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=522022.msg3794788#msg3794788 date=1319552951]
Then you won’t find one. Trolol
[/quote]

So you’re saying there exists no runescape remakes out there?

Btw; “Trololol” is a very old meme, stop being a newfag and stop using it because i am getting sick of it.

EDIT: How the fuck did my REP go up to 22?[/quote]kool story bro, ill live though.

YES THERE ARE NO RELEASED REMAKES. LEARN TO CODE!!! FFS

Read full topic
